data.convo: Betty , would you please read this letter of application I've just written ? I'd like to have your opinion . I'd be glad to tell you what I think . Good ! I'm interested in your advice . If I were you , I would change the beginning . You should write about your education first because we like to judge a man by his abilities . Good idea , Betty . What would you think about the second part ? I think it's too short . You'd better say something about your work experience . You're right , I'll change it . How about the last part ? Very good . But you should talk about your family , too . I agree . I appreciate your helping me .
